metadata.description: Location for all resources.
Name for Vnet. Node: -Vnet01 gets added to the end.
VNet CIDR. Must be /24
The Windows version for all the VMs. This will pick a fully patched image of this given Windows version.
Username for all the Virtual Machines.
Password for all the Virtual Machine.
The DC Name prefix. Note: -01 & -02 will be automatically added.
The Instance size for the jb VM.
The FQDN of the AD Domain to be created.
Number of VMs to deploy, limit 5 since this is a demo.
Name for the JumpBox Virtual Machine. Use this to access the new Domain controllers.
The Instance size for the jb VM.
The SQL Name prefix. Note: -01 & -02 will be automatically added.
The Instance size for the SQL VMs.
The SQL Cluster name to be created. Max 10
Number of SQL VMs to deploy, limit 5 since this is a demo.
Name of the owner of the VM
Application the VM belongs to
Environment the VM belongs to. E.g. Dev, Test, Prod
Business criticality of the application. Tier 1 is the highest criticality
The location of resources, such as templates and DSC modules, that the template depends on
Auto-generated token to access _artifactsLocation
